attributes.action: Prevent the closure of  Cheswardine and Moreton Saye Primary Schools in Shropshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers are looking to close our great village primary schools in the rural county of Shropshire. This would mean more overcrowing, more cars, more pollution and in time, vandalism due to decreased village social activities

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Save-Ches-School/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
